channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
**OBLITERATOR (NEUTRAL KILLER)**
(Passive) Restriction: If you killed more than one person last night, you cannot kill tonight. (Passive) Death's Reward: You are immune to death at night. (Day) Flee the Scene: If you are investigated by the Princess tonight, you will appear as a non-killer class. Uses: 2 (Night) Obliterate: Kill your target player and anyone who visits them. The Court Wizard's Ice Ward cannot stop this attack. Uses: Infinite (But 1-Night Cooldown if more than 1 person killed) (Night) Decimate: Stay home at night, removing anyone who visits you from existence. Their journal and role will not be revealed tomorrow, and they cannot speak while dead and cannot be revived. Uses: 1
Changelog: 5/26/17: Obliterator is created.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
This is a class that: can kill multiple people at night, ignore other role’s ability to stop visits (ice ward), ignore investigators (princess), and can stop killed targets from being revived. No thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
The ability “flee the scene” is too specific in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
Also, Flee the Scene doesn’t seem to fit well with a name like The Obliterator.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)

item.description:
Nerf Obliterate and get rid of Decimate This might be a good class

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
A killing ability that can bypass night immunity and can multi-kill?

No thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Obliterator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Ashie
item.description:
OBLITERATOR (NEUTRAL KILLER)

(Passive) Restriction: If you killed more than one person last night, you cannot kill tonight.
(Passive) Death’s Reward: You are immune to death at night.
(Day) Flee the Scene: If you are investigated by the Princess tonight, you will appear as a non-killer class. Uses: 2
(Night) Obliterate: Kill your target player and anyone who visits them. The Court Wizard’s Ice Ward cannot stop this attack. Uses: Infinite (But 1-Night Cooldown if more than 1 person killed)
(Night) Decimate: Stay home at night, removing anyone who visits you from existence. Their journal and role will not be revealed tomorrow, and they cannot speak while dead and cannot be revived. Uses: 1

Changelog:
5/26/17: Obliterator is created.

Read full topic
